turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about House demolition.
turn.1: What year did the extensive damage and reconstruction of housing stock in the Balkans take place?
turn.2: By the end of the Bosnian War in 1995, over 60% of the country's housing stock had been destroyed.
turn.3: Was this practice only used in the Balkans?
turn.4: Similar tactics have been used in a variety of other ethnic conflicts.
turn.5: What other countries participated in the destruction?

turn.7: Were the Arabs always the victims?
turn.8: The Israeli historian Benny Morris writes that in the later stages of the 1948 war, "[Israeli] commanders were clearly bent on driving out the population in the area they were conquering".
